ThingDef.label: triticale
ThingDef.description: Raw triticale kernels. Can be used in cooking or ground into flour.

ThingDef.label: barley
ThingDef.description: Raw barley kernels. Can be used in cooking or ground into flour.

ThingDef.label: amaranth
ThingDef.description: Raw amaranth kernels. Can be used in cooking or ground into flour.

ThingDef.label: Jerusalem artichoke
ThingDef.description: Tubers of a Jerusalem artichoke. Can be used in cooking or ground into flour.
